reviews.text:
Staff congregating and chatting (and swearing !) up to six of them near the ticket barriers to the mainline and the station needs a taxi ran for Hackney carriage taxis and NOT just a phone for private hires.

As for toilets well until they are replaced use the lifts folks !!
something will soon be done about it (cover cam lens first)

An embarrassment for Liverpool to international travellers !

Disgusting.

A shame the station is not being maintained. Was a brand new modern station when it opened but suffering from lack of maintenance. Both toilets are out of service, would recommend spare use of the lifts as very rickety. Buckets placed strategically to capture rain coming through roof. Never seen the turnstiles being used so assume they don’t work etc...convenient but degrading fast.

I'm bored and I felt compelled to write a review after reading what that bunch of whingers said about this station. It's a train station. If it doesn't smell of urine it gets at least 3 stars. There is a good shop and a good cafe there. You can get a train to anyway from there. You can get a bus to a get a plane to anywhere in the world. They'd whinge about anything some people.

My husband and I travelled to Southport from this station on Monday it was the first time we had travelled on a train using his mobility scooter and we were a bit worried. But there was no need as the staff were brilliant from entering the station to getting on the train helping him on the train with the use of a ramp to organising a ramp for when he got off at Southport couldn't ask for more .
Very busy rail interchange station and yet only two single person use toilets that always seem to be occupied. Simply unacceptable for the numbers of people using the station!
